name: component-testing
description: Automated component testing with Jest and React Testing Library
author: Claude Code

tasks.name: Set Up Jest Testing Framework
tasks.description: Configure Jest and React Testing Library
tasks.prompt:
Set up comprehensive testing infrastructure:

1. Install dependencies:
   - jest
   - @testing-library/react
   - @testing-library/jest-dom
   - @testing-library/user-event
2. Create jest.config.js
3. Configure Next.js compatibility
4. Set up test utilities in src/test-utils/
5. Create mock providers (Firebase, etc.)
6. Add test scripts to package.json
7. Configure code coverage reporting

tasks.name: Create Tests for Critical Components
tasks.description: Write comprehensive tests for key components
tasks.prompt:
Create tests for critical components:

1. Test dashboard components:
   - balance-card.tsx
   - cash-flow-chart.tsx
   - bills-list.tsx
   - income-list.tsx
2. Test form components:
   - bill-form.tsx
   - add-expense-form.tsx
   - add-income-form.tsx
3. Test each component for:
   - Rendering
   - User interactions
   - Data handling
   - Error states
   - Loading states
4. Aim for 80%+ coverage
5. Place tests in __tests__ directories

tasks.name: Unit Test Service Modules
tasks.description: Create unit tests for all service modules
tasks.prompt:
Write unit tests for services:

1. Test all service modules in src/services/:
   - balance-service.ts
   - bill-service.ts
   - budget-service.ts
   - goal-service.ts
   - income-service.ts
   - transaction-service.ts
2. Mock Firestore operations
3. Test success and error cases
4. Test edge cases and validation
5. Achieve 90%+ coverage for services
6. Create test utilities for Firestore mocks
